TopicTitle: Grumman F-14 Tomcat [now with infernal robotics wing swing]

Articles.Content:
Fishland now offers an aerial vehicle specifically tailored and equipped to taking passengers into areas of particular peril, a danger zone if you will. Presenting the F-14 Tomcat. To match the real thing the wings can be rotated in the VAB to provide either the retracted or extended forms. Specific instructions are available in the plane description. [DOWNLOAD](https://www.dropbox.com/s/juiaa5ki1tkb2bh/f-14%20Tomcat.craft?dl=0)(stock) [DOWNLOAD (infernal robotics)](https://www.dropbox.com/s/j7d5d86w7d0ksqv/f-14%20Tomcat%20infernal%20robotics.craft?dl=0)

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/132021866" width="1280" height="720" frameborder="0" title="KSP F-14 swing wing" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
